Description:
The Senior Architectural Engineer is responsible for the design and development of architectural projects. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of architectural principles and practices, as well as experience in managing and leading projects.Essential Duties and Responsibilities:Design and develop architectural projects from concept to completion
Work with clients to understand their needs and develop designs that meet their requirements
Coordinate with other engineering disciplines to ensure that projects are completed on time and within budget
Manage and lead project teams
Prepare technical reports and presentations
Stay up-to-date on the latest architectural trends and technologiesSkills
Skills: 1.       15-year experience with BS degree in Architectural engineering from a well-known university.
3.       3-year experience in Operation and Maintenance Projects.
4.       Experience in Architectural Design Development and Quality Control in Architectural Works, and BIM.
5.       Experience in interior and exterior design works.
6.       Ability to use a program/software related to Operation and Maintenance Projects.
7.       Speaking and writing in the English language is required.
8. Saudi Nationals or Foreigners, if foreigner you must have a transferable iqama.
